::DarkMouse::

*She sees the group walk through the forest and follows them to the base. 
She knows it will be dangerous, but she just has to try.  She wanted to be 
one of them so much.  Despite the last little bits of Pred programming in 
her, she just had to talk to them and try to make them understand that she 
is a changed bot.  She crept close and watched them enter.  She stayed 
outside but crept closer to the entrance.  She knew the sensors would pick 
her up and alert them to her presance.  But if that was the only way, them 
so be it.  She moved out and infront of the base and started to jumped up 
and down.*

"I hope this works."
_________________________________________________________________
>The People's group walk back to the Maximal Base.
>
>"We have to let him fight this on his own, I love him and I think he should
>get what he wants, but I want him to know I care, let's just stick here."
>Plintissa said. The People's Hroup (My characters.) eneter the Maximal base
>and look around for a doctor, just in case Suukie needs some help...
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Dark Mouse" <logomorph@...>

>
> > ::DarkMouse::
> >
> > *She gets up and starts to walk toward what she thinks is the Maximal
>base.
> > She hopes she will ba able to talk to them and let her join them.  She
>knows
> > it will not be easy for them to trust her.  But she has the strong 
>desire
>to
> > prove to them that she can be a good Maximal.*
> >
> > *She walks away and leaves the torn Pred symbol on the ground where it
> > fell.*
